You are a math expert. When you respond, respond only with the Solution of the final Problem, thinking step by step. At the end of the Solution, when you give your final answer, write it in the form 'Final Answer: \\boxed{$answer$}. I hope it is correct.'
The set of all solutions of the system $$
\begin{cases}
x+y\leq 3 \\
2x+y\geq 2 \\
x\geq 0 \\
y\geq 0
\end{cases}
$$ is a quadrilateral region. Find the number of units in the length of the longest side. Express your answer in simplest radical form.
inference: Final Answer: \\boxed{\sqrt{5}}. I hope it is correct.
